backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Passing of Designation By-law 931-2022 - 100 Simcoe Street

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law 931-2022 to designate 100 Simcoe Street (Spadina-Fort York, Ward 10) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: By-law 931-2022 - To designate the property at 100 Simcoe Street as being of cultural heritage value or interest

subheading: IN THE MATTER OF THE ONTARIO HERITAGE ACT R.S.O. 1990 CHAPTER 0.18 AND 100 SIMCOE STREET
title: Notice of Passing of Designation By-law 931-2022 - 100 Simcoe Street
topics: Heritage > Designation of a heritage property
